body_html: I can move all the helper functions to a separate file, but moving the 4 calls to check_against_reference outside of the test harness will require serious refactoring or code duplication of the thing that generates the reference tests, which I don't think buys us much except a sense of cleanliness.
body_text: I can move all the helper functions to a separate file, but moving the 4 calls to check_against_reference  outside of the test harness will require serious refactoring or code duplication of the thing that generates the reference tests, which I don't think buys us much except a sense of cleanliness.
body: I can move all the helper functions to a separate file, but moving the 4 calls to check_against_reference  outside of the test harness will require serious refactoring or code duplication of the thing that generates the reference tests, which I don't think buys us much except a sense of cleanliness.
